title: Unprecedented number of warm-water species moved northward during marine heatwave

title_detail.value: Unprecedented number of warm-water species moved northward during marine heatwave

summary: A new study documents an unprecedented number of southern marine species moving northward into California and as far north as Oregon during the 2014-2016 marine heatwave. Of 67 rare, warm-water species sightings observed, 37 had never been documented so far north before.

summary_detail.value: A new study documents an unprecedented number of southern marine species moving northward into California and as far north as Oregon during the 2014-2016 marine heatwave. Of 67 rare, warm-water species sightings observed, 37 had never been documented so far north before.
